name: Chicken Gives Gold
description:
Adventure games is probably the most common theme when it comes to make adventure funny games. itch.io App Store is full of arcade jumping games but it's still hard to find a good free game for Android to live the real adventure with it, Isn't it string!

But it's not the case for you today, Welcome to "Chicken Gives Gold", so be ready for a funny game experience. fun games has a classic in adventure game-play, with stunning and clean graphics and sounds.

Why are you still reading this and wasting your time. It's time to stop reading and start downloading this free jumping adventure. Oh you want some more details about it? Here you go then!

How to Play Chicken Gives Gold:

It's simple to play but hard to master, you have to be a good player to master it. Touch the screen and slide right and left and try to collect gold coming from the chicken. That's all.

Feature of Chicken Gives Gold:

  • Amazing and clean graphics
  • Simple and user friendly controls
  • Clean and hight quality sounds
  • Optimized for all Android devices including tabs
  • Google Plus sign in and leaderboard available

    • So are you ready to hit the game and live the adventure?

    It's a perfect and a must have this funny adventure game if you are bored with playing regular games. Just download Chicken Gives Gold and start your own adventure. Have fun !

    Don't forget to leave us rating and review to let us know what you think about Chicken Gives Gold. We always want to continue to deliver some of the best and most fun adventure games for your Android. Your feedback plays an important role to be able to achieve this goal.
